AppIdentifier.description: The application identifier must match the App ID property of the iOS mobile provisioning profile used for building. Your current application identifier does not meet the requirements for iOS apps and you will not be able to build and distribute iOS application packages. To be able to build for iOS, your application identifier must consist of one or more alphanumeric strings, separated by a dot. The strings must be valid uniform type identifiers (UTIs), containing letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) or periods.
AppIdentifier.errorMessage: Your current application identifier does not meet the requirements for iOS apps and you will not be able to build and distribute iOS application packages. To be able to build for iOS, your application identifier must consist of one or more alphanumeric strings, separated by a dot. The strings must be valid uniform type identifiers (UTIs), containing letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphens (-) or periods.

BundleVersion.description: The application (or bundle) version. The version must consist of two or three numbers separated by dots.
BundleVersion.errorMessage: The version must consist of two or three numbers separated by dots.
